name: A Space Shooter (particledev)
description:
This is my first ever game, took me a while to develop it, it is very small in terms of content, though :D

Of course, any feedback is GREATLY & ULTIMATELY welcomed & needed!

More importantly, if you found any bugs just point at it!

Some Credits :

- ALL graphics & sprites are from kenney assets

- Explosions are from Untied Games

- sounds are from nengisuls, josepharaoh99, Robinhood76, FlashTrauma and ddragonpearl

Features

- 5 Playable Ships

- 5 Missions to play

- Don't-PickUp-Any-PowerUp-You-Find Play Approach :D

- Mission Rating based on collectibles

HOW TO PLAY

- Use Mouse to aim and Left Mouse to shoot

- WSAD keys to move around and DODGE! :D

Hope you enjoy it!
